title: Excise Dept. calls for report on distillery stocks
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Commissioner-General of the Excise Department Kapila Kumarasinghe said that an analytical report has been called regarding all stocks present in liquor companies and distilleries.
According to the Excise Commissioner all locally manufactured and imported liquor and beer will be permitted to be released to the local market, after passing international standards.
